message: I propose dividing the money into 75:25, as I believe this is fair considering the potential inflation.
I propose a 60:40 split, with me getting 60% of the money. This is a fair offer considering the inflation, and I'm willing to negotiate further if you have any other suggestions.
Considering the inflation, I propose an equal division of the money, 50:50. I believe this maintains fairness while acknowledging the decrease in value of our currency.
